47a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sa nag po'o// 'dod pa gnyis pa la ni dang po'i kha dog gi rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi cha nyid rnam par bkra ba'i rin po che'i snam bu'o// yang na de la kha dog gzhan gyi rin po che las byas pa/ 
47a2(rgyud 'grel): bkod pa'i rin po che'i snam bu'o// lnga pa'i kha dog gi rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi cha nyid dra ba dang drab byed pa sna tshogs pa'i snam bu 'am// yang na de la mdog gzhan gyi rin po che las byas pa bkod pa'i dra 
47a3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i snam bu'o// phyogs gzhan brjod pa ni de'i steng du rin po che'i snam bu dra ba'i snam bu lta bu'o// 'dod pa gnyis ka la yang stegs bu ni shel lam gser gyi rang bzhin nam pad+ma rA ga'i 
47a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin nam/ rin po che gzhan yang rung ste ji ltar mdzes pa'o// rin po che'i shar bu dang mda' yab rnams ni dkar po'o// rin po che'i shar bu dang / mda' yab dang / dar sbyangs kyi bar gyi sa gzhi ni sngon
47a5(rgyud 'grel): po ste/ nam mkha'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro// de nyid kyi phyir bar gyi snam bu la mun pa'i snam bu zhes brjod do// gdung ni ji ltar mdzes par rin po che las byas pa ste/ rin po che sna tshogs pa'i pa tra 'phro ba 
47a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas brgyan pa'o// rta babs kyi ka ba rnams ni rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go/ skyog po'i nang gi bla res kyi 'og gi sa yang ste/ de ni rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog gi/ 
47a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi spras pa'i nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// rta rmig dang / bar na dang / chu srin gyi snam bu ni gser gyi kha dog ji ltar mdzes par ro// 'khor lo rnams ni gser gyi kha dog go/ kha cig rin po che gzhan las kyang // 
47a8(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'o zhes so// ri dgas dang ri dgas mo ni gser gyi rang bzhin te/ rin po che gzhan gyis spras pa'o// sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba ni nag po'o// kha cig tu gtso bo'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go/ 
47b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi rwa rnams ni rang rang gi phyogs rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go/ de las gzhan pa rnams ni de'i glo dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go/ rwa lnga pa la ni de las gzhan pa'i phyogs dang 
47b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog ste/ ji ltar rigs par ro// phyogs gcig gi rwa thams cad kyang rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog kyang kha cig tu'o// 'khor lo'i dbang po zhal
47b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa nyid la rang rang gi phyogs kyi zhal gyi mdog go/ zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no// bum pa bzang po rnams ni gser las byas pa'o// dpag bsam gyi shing rnams ni de las gzhan pa'i shing bzang po lta bu'o// 
47b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i lte ba ni ljang gu'o// ge sar ni ser po'o// 'dab ma rnams ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'o// de'i sa gzhi dmar po shas che ba'i dkar po'o// chos 'byung gi cha'i re khA ni dkar po'o// khor yug gi phyogs pa 
47b5(rgyud 'grel): yang shel nyid yin na re khA dkar po 'am gser nyid yin na ni ser po'o// rdo rje rnams dang de'i re khA nag po'o// gzhan rnams ni dkar po'am ser po'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i mdog ni ji ltar
47b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa ste/ bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor la 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' nas steng du 'og min gyi mtha' bar du rdo rje'i rab gnas pa'i phyir dang rlung la sogs pa rnams ni ji ltar rigs par kha dog sna tshogs 
47b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir ro// 'od zer rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog ste 'phro ba'i tshul lo// 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni rdzogs sangs ye shes sku yin phyir// ngag dbang rdo rje'i rigs su brjod// chos sku'i rang bzhin 
47b8(rgyud 'grel): dag pa la// 'di yi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro// zhes pa'i rigs pas/ dkar po ser po de bzhin dmar// ljang gu dang ni nag po nyid// rtsig pa'i tshon zhes gsungs so// gang gi tshe chos rnams rang bzhin 
48a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni dkur// ngas na gang bang b.rang dag hang // ces gsungs pas// gsung rnga rje dkar ba gas par gyur pa nga'i chen chen gyir khA dkar po dang ser ze dang ljang gu dang / dkar pa ga/ 
48a2(rgyud 'grel): khaskyor du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dkar ba nyid yin yang / maM bskang ba dang lhan cig rig cig pa nyid du bsan pa'i phyir/ nang gi rtsig pa nag pa nyid do// gzhan du ni dkar ba khon yin te/ ji mad du/ 
48a3(rgyud 'grel): kAm+mA rdzogaci nga byung pal cig tu dgar ba nyid du 'gyung ba nas gsungs sa// rtsa ba 'breg sa ga kyila'i khang du yang zur thog gnas gnyis sa bcad pa'i phyogs pan las gzharnams dang shi 
48a4(rgyud 'grel): gas pa m-i sa sa / rnams kyang ba na/ ga bgashe pa gagags pa'i maca pa 'byu bas ma 
48a5(rgyud 'grel): gtso ba las ni gtso ba' mdagag/ sna chags ba' 'a ba mni/ bden thal ldang la dbang ldanan pa/ bdang rlung ga batshams na sar/ thogs rnams kyi na dmar tsha// gtaza' snam bral ni gsam mamatshan 
48a6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i zed pa'o// de zhugazhan ni ma ga dang sgom pa ng+ge la mdzes pa'o// bdi mchog gi dkyil 'khor la nino dregs kyi la ba lo nag ga// de'i rtsibs kyi bar rnams ni dmar po hUM/ gsung gi 'khor la 
48a7(rgyud 'grel): ba yin pa'i phyir ro// gsung gi 'khor lo dmar pa'o// de'i rtsibs par rnams ni dkar ba ste// sku'i 'kho la lalta ba yin pa'i'aphyir ro// sbrul 'khor lo ni dkar ba'o// de'i rtsa bas rnams kyi ba ni ga 
48a8(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'kha ga go// mu khyud gsum nago rabs bzhin du rje rjenag po dag pad+ma dmar pa dang / 'khor lo dkar po'i phreng 
48b1(rgyud 'grel): cas/ sa nas brtsams tan dag par du// dgu dang / dkang ba dang / dmang pa dang / sar pa dang / nag pa' kha gagapa thardzu// sha dang / zung dang / rub dang / blo dang / dbus 
48b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang / bas rnams gal dag dkar ba dang / snang gu dang / demar po dang / sar pa dang / nag pa'o// gzhan ni gam lnga dang / sa gzhi dang / tshig rnams nag po dang / ljang gr-i dang / dmar pa dang / @ 
48b3(rgyud 'grel): dang / dkar ba dang / bsas pab stan pa' mdag ga zhis ze // de bzhin du sngam dang / khyi ma 'dag gi rnam pa yongs sra bsams nas rdul tshigang dgye bar bya'o// de yang bskal pa dang mi ldan 
48b4(rgyud 'grel): sa pan mnan pa da T+TakrA r+dz+dza dag par zlog/ zhal pa dang maldan pa mnan no/ sgyu ldan pa s+yAd / rjes sku / sngags ma'am/ 'brang ga/ dpa' ba/ lags par 'dus rgya 
48b5(rgyud 'grel): 6/ dak+ta na ba gags kyis nas pa sa kyim du/ ngan na// mtshan ma ma gzugs dang / lugs pa bu nas / 
48b6(rgyud 'grel): ga d+hag parnam na par sad pa'i na mam las gsungs/ minas nan thos pa yi// phyag rgya'am mtshanam dag pa // gang yang gsangs pa/ nan pa ya na pa rnams kyi 
48b7(rgyud 'grel): thos pa rnams kyis rnam par smras rnams// dpal kha sgyur gyi rgyung su yang / de sa grams ma dang / 'dus byas pa la sags pa'i gzugs dang / mtshan ma'i phyug r+b+ha dang ldan pa'o// zhes gsos so// 
48b8(rgyud 'grel): mapa' ma'am // bar bcamaldan 'das 'das pa na rje'i thab sa ma khri tha ba sangams// shang ma pa la rnam pa sang sa nga kyal 'am ka pa mas ga ga 
49a1(rgyud 'grel): lhor nyi ma la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rin po che ljang gu pa'o// nub tu nyi ma la mgon po 'od dpag med kyi pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'o// byang du nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i ral gri ljang gu'o// mer 
49a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba la spyan ma'i mig 'bras nag po can gyi mig dkar po gnyis sprin la gnas pa'o// bden thal du zla ba la mA ma kI'i rdo rje nag po rtse lnga pa ste/ chung ngu de ltar bshad pa'i phyir ro// rlung du zla ba la gos 
49a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar me'i pad+ma dmar po kha bye ba yu ba dang rtsa ba dang bcas pa'o// dbang ldan du zla ba la sgron ma'i ut+pal mdog sngo ser ro// me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi dang / shar sgo'i g.yon dang g.yas su cha chung
49a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gnyis spangs pa'i 'gram dag tu zla ba rnams la go rim bzhin du gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi me long dkar po dang / dri za'i pi wang sngon po dang / 
49a5(rgyud 'grel): ser po'i dung dang / ro'i snod dmar po dang / ras sna tshogs dang / chos 'byung dkar po'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgor nyi ma rnams la gshin rje mthar byed dang / shes rab mthar byed dang / pad+ma mthar byed dang / 
49a6(rgyud 'grel): bgegs mthar byed kyi go rims bzhin du rdo rje tho ba nag po dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug par dkar po dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / rdo rje khagyes pa sngon po'o// 'dir zla ba dang nyi ma bcu dgu ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas 
49a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// mtshan ma thams cad ni 'od zer dang bcas pa rang rang gi phyogs su mgo bstan pa'o// 'khor lo'i dbang phyug ni mgo nub tu bstan pa'o// de ltar phyi ma rnams su yang ngo // rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor 
49a8(rgyud 'grel): lo'i dbang phyug nyid la ni dbus su chu skyes dang / zla ba la zhi ba'i rdo rje sngon po'o// kha cig ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o zhes so// mkhas pa rnams ni dbus kyi 'od zer gyi thig zlum po la tshon gyi re khA mi bya'o zhes 
49b1(rgyud 'grel): so// zlum po'i thig gi phyi ngos su tshangs pa'i thig gi glo so sor cha chung bzhi dor nas bum pa cha chung bzhi pa ste/ bdud rtsis bkang pa'i gser gyi bum pa cha brgyad do zhes phyogs gcig go/ gzhan ni rin po 
49b2(rgyud 'grel): tshe'i rang bzhin rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go zhes so// 'di dang phyi ma rnams la dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan pa'i mtshan ma 'god pa na/ de'i gnas su dbus kyi mtshan/ 
49b3(rgyud 'grel): ma bri bar bya'o// bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// dbus su nyi ma la mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje kha gyes pa rtse lnga pa in+d+ra nI la lta bu dang / reg bya rdo rje ma'i sna tshogs pa'i gos so// rnam
49b4(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rim pa dang po dang gnyis par gnas pa bcu gnyis po rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no// rim pa gsum pa'i sgo'i 'gram gyi snam bu la tshangs pa'i thig nas
49b5(rgyud 'grel): cha chung bzhi dor bar g.yon du byams pa'i klu shing gi me tog 'khor lo dang bcas pa'o// g.yas su sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dkar po'o// lhor de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje'i dang nam mkha' 
49b6(rgyud 'grel): snying po'i rdo rje dang / rin po che mar gang cha dgu pa'o// nub tu de bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi pad+ma dmar po dang rdo rje'o// byang du de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel 
49b7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i ral gri dang rdo rje'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rim pa bzhin du gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams kyi rdo rje tho ba dang / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang / parma
49b8(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang / sna tshogs rdo rje'o// me la sogs pa'i mtshams su go rims bzhin du mi g.yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / dbyug pa sngon po dang / stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri dang / 
50a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang / rdo rjes mtshan pas dbyug pa nag po'o// gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rdo rje sngon po ni gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma las byi ngos su'o// 
50a2(rgyud 'grel): kha cig ni 'khor lo ser po zhes bya'o// gnod mdzes rgyal po'i rdo rje ni pad+ma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma las phyi ros su'o// byams pa la sogs pa brkyang rnams kyi mtshan ma ni zla ba gnas pa'o// gshin rje 
50a3(rgyud 'grel): gshed la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bcu ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o// 'dir nyi ma dang zla ba sum cu rtsa gcig ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'o// bum pa bri ba ni sngar bzhin no// kha sbyor du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i 
50a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la dbus su zla ba la rdo rje sems pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po'o// shar du zla ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo'o// lhor nyi ma la rin po che dbang po'i rin chen no// nub tu nyi ma la snang ba mtha' yas kyi/ 
50a5(rgyud 'grel): mnga'o// byang du nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o// spyan ma'i sprin la gnas pa'i mig gnyis so// mA ma kI'i mda'o// gos dkar mo'i mda'o// sgrol ma'i ut+pa la dmar po'o// rim pa gnyis 
50a6(rgyud 'grel): par shar du drag mo'i mnga'o// lhor rdo rje gzugs ma'i rdo rje'o// nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i ral gri'o// byang du rdo rje zhib mo'i tal ba thung ngu'o// dbang ldan du rdo rje gnod sbyin ma'i dbyug pa dkar ser ro// 
50a7(rgyud 'grel): mer mkha' 'gro ma'i pad+ma dmar ser ro// bden bral du sgra rdo rje ma'i shag ti'o// rlung dus rdo rje ma'i bum pa dkar ldang ngo // rim pa gsum par shar gyi phyogs su gzhad ma'i rdo rje kha dog dmar po'o// lhor// 
50a8(rgyud 'grel): sgeg ma'i rdo rje'o// nub tu glu ma'i mkhar rnga'o// byang du gar ma'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa ljang gu'o// dbang ldan du gling bu ma'i gling bu'o// mer pi wang ma'i pi wang ngo // bden bral du mu kun Da ma'i mu kung Da'o// 
50b1(rgyud 'grel): rlung du rdza rnga ma'i rdza rnga'o// phyi'i snam bu'i mer me tog ma'i me tog gi phreng ba'o// bden bral du bdug spos ma'i spos por ro// rlung du mar me ma'i mar me'i mchod sdong ngo // dbang ldan du dri ma'i dri'i rung / 
50b2(rgyud 'grel): chos so// shar du me long ma'i me long ngo // lhor ro ma'i ro'i snod // nub tu reg bya ma'i gos sna tshogs so// byang du tshes ma'i chos 'byung dkar po'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgor ni go rims
50b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje zhags pa ma dang / rdo rje lcags sgrogs ma dang / rdo rje dril bum rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje phreng ba'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje lugs sgrog dang / rdo rje dril/ 
50b4(rgyud 'grel): bu ma rnams te/ nyi ma la gnas pa'o// 'dir brjod pa'i nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa'i mtshan ma bdun las mtshan ma gzhan ni zla ba la gnas pa'o// nyi ma dang zla ba sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di rnams ni sna 
50b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pad+ma'i steng du thod pa rnams la gnas pa'o// bum pa bri ba ni snga ma bzhin te/ thig zlum po drug pa las phyi rol du zhes pa ni khyad par ro// ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor la dbus// 
50b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / shar dang byang dang / nub dang / lho rnams su go rims bzhin du ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma mi zad ma dang / ro langs ma dang / gtum mo rnams kyis 
50b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha T+wAM ka rnams so// dbang ldan dang / me dang bden bral dang rlung rnams su seng ge mo dang stag mo dang / ce spyang ma dang 'ug pa mo rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu rnams so// shar dang / byang dang 
50b8(rgyud 'grel): nub dang / lce'i sgo rnams su rgyal po'i dbang mo dang / gsal byed ma dang / 'jib byed ma dang / kau pa dzA rnams kyi go rims bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyam pa kha bye ba dang / thal mo kha sbyar ba dang 
51a1(rgyud 'grel): snyim pa khrag gis bkang ba dang / rdo rje thal mo kha sbyar ba'i the bo'i rtse mo gnyis sbyar ba'i mdzub mo gnyis sbar ba'o// 'dir mtshan ma dang phyag rgya rnams ni sna tshogs ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyim 
51a2(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'o// bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma ni rim pa bzhin du/ seng ge dang / mche ba can dkar po dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang / 
51a3(rgyud 'grel): ma he dang / sbrul gyi dbang po brgyad kyi mjug ma dang / ro bzhi la gnas pa ste/ de ltar rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la ni bskal pa dang mi ldan pa 'dus pa ni bri bar mi bya'o// gzhan du ni ngal bas 'jigs dang 
51a4(rgyud 'grel): yon bdag bsdus pa la dga' bas so// skal ba dang ldan pa rab tu dang bar bya ba'i don du ni yon bdag gi dbang las bri bar bya'o// de ltar phyi ma rnams la yang ji ltar 'byung ba bri ba dang mi bri bar rig par 
51a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// phyi ngos kyi thig zlum po'i ngos su bum pa bri'o// bcu bdun gyi bdag nyid kyi kye'i rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba la khro bo'i rdo rje sngon po'o// shar dang lhol sogs pa 
51a6(rgyud 'grel): dang // dbang ldan dang mo la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la ni rim pa bzhin du rdo rje drag po dang / rdo rje gzugs ma dang / 'dod chags rdo rje ma dang / rdo rje zhib mo dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin ma dang / rdo rje 
51a7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma dang / sgra rdo rje ma dang / sa rdo rje ma rnams kyi mda' dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / tal ba thung ngu dang / dbyug pa ser po dang / pad+ma dmar ser dang / sha ka ti dang / bum pa dkar ldang
51a8(rgyud 'grel): ngo// rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan dang me la sogs pa rnams su gling bu ma dang / pi wang ma dang / mu kuN+Da ma dang / rdza rnga ma rnams kyi gling bu dang / pi wang dang / rnga mu kun Da dang / rdza rnga rnams so// 
51b1(rgyud 'grel): shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje zhags pa ma dang / rdo rje lugs sgrogs ma dang / rdo rje dril bum rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje lugs sgrog dang / rdo rje
51b2(rgyud 'grel): dril bu rnams so// mtshan ma bcu bdun po 'di rnams ni thod pa dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// gling bu ma la sogs pa brgyad kyi ni thod pa'i 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma'o// phyag gnyis pa dang bzhi pa la ni 
51b3(rgyud 'grel): thod pa med do// phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba khwa za'i rdo rje ldan pa'o// shar la sogs pa dang / dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la gau d+da dang / tsi rI dang / ro las 
51b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang / za phod ma dang / spos mo dang / ri khrod ma dang / gtum mo dang / rab tu rmongs byed ma rnams kyi rim pa bzhin du mda' dang / rdo rje dang / thod pa khrag dang bcas pa la gnas pa'i rus sbal 
51b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / tshil gyi rkang pa la gnas pa'i sbrul dang / shas bkang ba la gnas pa'i seng ge dang / khu ba dang bcas pa'i thod pa la gnas pa'i dge slong dang / khrag dang bcas pa'i thod pa la gnas
51b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stag dang chang gi snod rnams so// rim pa gnyis pa'i mtshams rnams su gling bum la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni snga ma bzhin no// shar la sogs pa'i sgor stag gdong ma dang / phag 
51b7(rgyud 'grel): gdong ma dang / khyi gdong ma dang / seng ge'i gdong ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje lcags sgrogs dang / rdo rje dril bu'o// mtshan ma bcu bdun po 'di rnams nyi ma la 
51b8(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o// gling bu ma la sogs pa brgyad kyi nyi ma'i 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma rnams so// dbus kyi 'od zer gyi phyi ngos su sngar bzhin du bum pa rnams so// bdag med pa'i dkyil 'khor
52a1(rgyud 'grel): la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba dang / shar la sogs pa'i 'dab rnams la go rims bzhin du bdag med ma dang / rdo rje ma dang / dkar mo dang / chu ma dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang / rim pa 
52a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis par phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor du brjod pa'i dkar mo la sogs pa rnams kyi rdo rje'o// gling bu ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni snga ma bzhin no// rta gdong ma la sogs pa'i gri gug rnams so// 
52a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' stong pa 'ardo rjen rtag dang ma'i byings su'o// sa srung ma'i rdo rjen khrig dang ma'i phyi ngos su'o// 'drir thi grag bzhin nyi ma la gnas pa'o// mtshan ma gzhan ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// 
52a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi'i dkar mo la sogs pa bco brgyad po rnams kyi zla ba dang / nyi ma ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'o// gling bu ma la sogs pa brgyad med pa ni lhag ma lha mo bco lnga po rnams kyi zla ba la gri gug rnams so// 
52a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' spyod ma'i mtshan ma ni dkar mo'i phyi ngos su// ro langs ma'i phyi ngos su sa spyod ma'o// de bzhin du ku ru kul+le'i dkyil 'khor la yang yin te/ khyad par ni zla ba la yu ba dang bcas pa'i ut+pal dmar po
52a6(rgyud 'grel): kha 'bus pa'i mda' yod pa'o// 'dir lha mo bco lnga po rnams kyang ku ru kul+le bzhin du mdog dmar po'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang po la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba dang / shar la sogs pa dang dbang ldan
52a7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la go rims bzhin du rdo rje bdud rtsi dang / zhi ba mo dang / zhe gdong ma dang / zla ldan ma dang / ri bong can ma dang / zla dkyil ma dang / zla tshes ma dang / yid 'ong ma dang / yid tshim 
52a8(rgyud 'grel): byed ma rnams kyi rdo rje'o// khyad par ni zla tshes ma'i zla ba cha gcig pa'o// rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams su me tog ma dang / bdug spos ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri chab ma rnams kyi
52b1(rgyud 'grel): me tog gi za ma tog dang / spos phor dang / mar me'i mchod sdong dang / dri'i dung chos rnams so/ shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams su gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi'i gling bu la sogs pa bzhi'o// shar la 
52b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i sgo rnams su khro gnyer rim par ldan dang / 'jigs sdigs dang / rta gzugs dang / tshogs kyi gtso bo rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu rnams so// 
52b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di rnams ni zla ba la gnas pa'o// me tog ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis kyi zla ba'i 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma'o// yang na dkyil 'khor pa thams cad la chos 'byung bri bar bya'o// 
52b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid kho na bri bar bya'o zhes pa ni gzhan dag go/ gzhan rdo rje bdud rtsi gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan ma rnams ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud du rigs par bya'o// dgu'i bdag nyid can kye'i rdo rje gsum gyi 
52b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar nyi ma la rdo rje sngon po kha gyes pa'o// shar la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab mar zla ba rnams la go rims bzhin du dkar mo dang / chom rkun ma dang / 
52b6(rgyud 'grel): ro langs ma dang / za pod ma dang / spos mo dang / ri khrod ma dang / gtum mo dang / g.yong mo rnams kyi gri gug dang / cang te'u dang / rus sbal dang / sbrul dang / seng ge dang / dge slong dang / 'khor lo// 
52b7(rgyud 'grel): dang / rdo rje rnams so// phyag bcu drug pa'i nyi ma la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i thod pa dkar po zhes pa ni khyad par ro/ phyi ngos kyi zlum po las phyi ngos su bum pa rnams so// sku ma chen mo'i dkyil
52b8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la pad+ma dmar po'i lte bar nyi ma la bcom ldan 'das ma sgyu ma chen po'i pad+ma'i snod do// shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma'i zla ba rnams la g.yas bskor du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / rin chen mkha' 
53a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma dang / pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma dang / sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang / rin po che'i snye ma dang / sna tshogs chu skyes dang / ral gri'o// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje sems dpa' 
53a2(rgyud 'grel): la 'khrud nas gnas pas de'i mtshan ma tha dad du mi dgod do// dgu'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar nyi ma la cang te'u'o// shar dang / byang dang / nub dang / lko ngang// 
53a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan dang / me dang / bden bral dang / rlung gi 'dab mar nyi ma rnams la sna tshogs sde ma dang / 'dod ma dang / sa 'og na gnas ma dang / legs bzangs ma dang / chang 'tshong ma dang / 'byung mo dang / phyag bzhi ma dang / nam 
53a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la gnas ma rnams kyi gri gug rnams so// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la dbus su rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi rdo rje'o// shar la sogs par g.yon skor du rdo rje dbyug pa dang / nyi ma me dang / rdo rje gtsug tor dang / rdo rje 'khyil pa 
53a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang / me la sogs par g.yas skor du rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje dus dang / nag po chen po dang / rdo rje bsdigs pa dang / gtsug tor dang / rdo rje sa 'og rnams kyi rdo rje tho ba dang / rdo rje dbyug pa dang / chu skyes dmar po 
53a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje'i gtun shing rnams te/ mtshan ma thams cad ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// yang na shar// 
53a7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i phyogs su g.yas skor du gshin rje mthar byed dang / shes rab mthar byed dang / pad+ma mthar byed dang / bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi rdo rje'i tho ba dang / rdo rje mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang / pad+ma 
53a8(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang / sna tshogs rdo rje'o// me la sogs pa'i mtshams su mi g.yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang // dbyug pa sngon po dang / stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon 
53b1(rgyud 'grel): po dang / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa nag po'o// gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma las byi ngos su gtsug tor 'khor lo can gyi rdo rje'o// pad+ma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma las phyi ngos su gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje'o// mtshan ma
53b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu gcig po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// yang na bgegs dgra'i rdo rje khagyes pa'o// me la sogs pa rnams su 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / dbyug pa sngon po dang / stobs po che dang / mi 
53b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba rnams kyi lugs kyu dang / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang / rtse gsum pa dang / ral gri'o// gtsug tor 'khor lo can gyi 'khor lo ser po chen po'o// gzhan rnams kyi bshad ma thag pa snga ma
53b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no// yang na gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi po rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje dril bu rnams te/ gzhan gyi ni bshad ma thag pa snga ma bzhin no// ba 
53b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar gnas pa'i nyi ma la dpal bde mchog gi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po kha gyes pa'o// phyogs bzhi'i 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma dang / lA ma dang / dum skyes ma dang / 
53b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can ma rnams kyi gri gug rnams so// mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la pad+ma'i snod rnams so// thugs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rtsibs nyi shu rtsa bzhi la rab tu gtum mo dang / gtum mig ma dang 'od 
53b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan ma dang sna chen ma dang dpa' bo'i blo can ma dang / mi'u thung ma dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang / shing grib ma dang sa bsrungs ma dang / 'jigs byed chen mo dang / rlung gi shugs can ma dang / chang 'thung ma 
53b8(rgyud 'grel): dang / lha mo sngo sangs ma dang / rab tu bzang mo dang / rta rna mo dang / bya gdong ma dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang / dum skyes ma dang / chang 'tshong ma dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang / rab tu dpa' mo dang / 
54a1(rgyud 'grel): stobs chen mo dang / 'khor lo sgyur ma dang / brtson 'grus chen mo rnams kyi gri gug go// gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir dpa' bo rnams kyi mtshan ma mi bri'o// sgo rnams su khra gdong ma dang / 'ug gdong mdang 
54a2(rgyud 'grel): khyi gdong ma dang / phag gdong ma rnams dang / mtshams su gshin rje brtan ma dang / gshin rje pho nya mo dang / gshin rje mche ba mo dang / gshin rje 'joms ma mo rnams kyi sna tshogs rku skyes ma/ nyi ma rnams la gri 
54a3(rgyud 'grel): gug go/ 'dir shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su g.yon skor du dang / me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su g.yas skor du mtshan ma dgod do/ phyingos su zlum po'i thig las phyi rol gyi mtshams kyi char bum pa
54a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams bri'o// de las gzhan pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa dang / rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi phreng bar brjod do// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas thos pa'i dkyil 'khor la 
54a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes la nyi mar cang ti'u'o// lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams kyi gri gug rnams te/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su g.yon bskor dang / me la sogs pa'i mtshams su g.yas bskor ro// de la 
54a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo nag po'i rtsibs kyi steng du phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la legs phreng can ma dang / thod pa can ma dang / 'jigs ma dang / mi thub ma rnams kyi'o// mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la thod pa rnams so// de
54a7(rgyud 'grel): nas rdo rje sngon po'i phreng ba'o// rim pa gnyis pa la rtsibs brgyad dmar po la gnas pa'i chu skyes brgyad rnams la phyogs rnams su dge ba'i ska rags ma dang / gzugs can ma dang / rnam rgyal ma dang / 'od can
54a8(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams kyi'o// mtshams rnams su dus can mo dang / mtsho chen mo dang / byed ma dang / bsod ma rnams kyi'o// de nas rdo rje phreng ba dmar po'o// rim pa gsum par rtsibs brgyad dkar po la gnas pa'i pad+ma 
54b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad la phyogs su sgrol ma dang / 'jigs mthong ma dang / legs mthong ma dang / thub dka' ma rnams kyi'o// mtshams rnams su dge ma dang / grib gnon ma dang / dus mtshon mo dang / grags chen ma rnams kyi'o// 
54b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje phreng ba dkar po'o// sgo'i pad+ma rnams la mdzes ma dang / nor 'dzin ma dang / skal bzang mo dang / mthong ba yid 'ong ma rnams kyi'o// pad+ma nyi shu'i steng du nyi ma rnams la gri gug rnams so zhes gdams so// 
54b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi sna tshogs pad+ma dang / rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa'o// shar dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho'i re mig rnams la pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i kha T+wAM ga rnams so// dbang ldan dang 
54b4(rgyud 'grel): me la sogs pa'i re mig la kha T+wAM ga dang / lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / dbyug pa'o// shar la sogs pa'i re mig rnams la kha T+wAM ga rnams kyi phyi ngos su rim pa bzhin du khar bsdus pa'i lag pa gnyis dang / 
54b5(rgyud 'grel): snyim pa sbyar ba dang khrag gi snyim pa dang gtun shing ngo // kha T+wAM ga la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams pad+ma dang nyi mar gnas pa'o// 'od zer gyi khong yug gi phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su bdud rtsi'i thod pa gsum mo// byang 
54b6(rgyud 'grel): du skron ma'i thod pa gsum dang / nub du gtor ma'i thod pa gsum dang / lhor btung ba'i thod pa gsum dang / dbang ldan du snyems pa'i lag pa dang / dri'i snod do// mer ni pi wang dang / me tog gi za ma tog go/ 
54b7(rgyud 'grel): bden bral du sdigs mdzub kyi lag pa dang spos snod do// rlung du thal mo dang mar me'o// de nas rdo rje phreng ba'i khor yug gi phyi'i shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la so sor bzhi bzhi dang sgo dang mtshams su
54b8(rgyud 'grel): brgyad te kha T+wAM gnyer bzhi'o// bdud rtsi'i thod pa la sogs pa ni mtsho skyes ma nyi ma la gnas pa'o// gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyi 
55a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sngon po rtsi lnga pa khagyes pa'o// shar dang lho la sogs pa'i rwa'i rtsa ba rnams su rtag pa dang / rin chen dbang po dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa rnams kyi 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa dang 
55a2(rgyud 'grel): rin po che ljang gu cha dgu pa dang / pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa dang / ral gri ljang gu rnams so// sna tshogs rdo rje'i me dang / bden bral la sogs pa'i grwar rdo rje tsar tsi ka dang rdo rje phag mo dang rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang / dkar mo rnams 
55a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri'o// de nas rdo rje 'phreng ba'o// de nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyogs so sor rwa lnga'o// shar dang lho la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su thob gshin rje gshed dang / dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dang / pad+ma/ 
55a4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed dang / ral gri gshin rje gshed rnams kyi rdo rje rtse mo nyi shubs mtshan pa 'thob dang / dbyug pa dkar po dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / ral gri'o// 'dir rtag pa dang / lha mo rnams kyi mtshan ma ni zla ba la gnas pa'o// 9 
55a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o// nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'og tu ni sna tshogs pad+ma'o// dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams su pad+ma la gnas pa'i thod pa bzhi'o// rwa'i glo rnams su bum pa rnams so// rdo rje sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma 
55a6(rgyud 'grel): lte bar zla ba la rdo rje rtse dgu pa gser gyi mdog can no// shar dang sgrol sogs pa'i 'dab mar zla ba rnams la me tog sgrol ma dang / bdug spos sgrol ma dang / mar me'i sgrol ma dang / dri'i sgrol ma rnams kyi ma tog gi 
55a7(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba dang / spos phor dang / mar me'i skong bu dang / dri'i dung chos rnams so// me la sogs pa'i 'dab mar rtag pa dang / mi bskyod pa dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo dang / 
55a8(rgyud 'grel): rdorje dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri rnams so// shar dang lho la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje nags pa mo dang / rdo rje lugs sgrog ma dang / rdo rje dril bum rnams kyi lcags kyu la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te/ 
55b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la'o// rdo rje lugs kyu ma'i phyi ngos su gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i 'khor lo sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la'o// rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i phyi ngos su rdo rje gnod mdzes ma'i sbrul gyi zhags pa ste/ 
55b2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la'o// me la sogs pa'i mtshams su pad+ma las spyan ma dang mA ma k+Shi dang / gos dkar mo sgrol ma rnam par dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bum pa dang / ri rab dang / me thab dang rgyal 
55b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan chen po'o// pad+ma'i phyi ngos su bum pa rnams so// 'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma'am/ zla ba la mnga' ste mtshan mo zla ba la gnas shing nyin par nyi ma la gnas te lha mo rnam par 
55b4(rgyud 'grel): chu'o// shar dang lho la sogs pa'i phyogs su arkam si dang / marka ma yi dang / an dar d+han ma si dang / te dze ma si'i lha mo rnams kyi go rims bzhin du khab dang skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang / a sho ka'i yal ga 
55b5(rgyud 'grel): dang mda' rnams so// mi dang srin po la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su ud ya ma si dang / gul ma ma si dang / ba na ma si dang / tsI ba ram si rnams kyi mtshan ma ni go rims bzhin du arka ma si la sogs pa'i 
55b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma bzhin no// phyi'i phro brang gi snam bu'i shar du ma hA tsI ba ra ma si dang / ba rA ha mu khi'i lha mo dag gi rdo rje dang lcags kyu gnyis so// lho phyogs su lha mo pa dA kra ma si dang / ba ra li dag gi a sho ka'i 'dab ma gnyis 
55b7(rgyud 'grel): so// nub tu lha mo pa ra kra ma si dang / ba da li dag gi mda' gnyis so// byang du lha mo urma ma si dang ba rA li dag gi khab gnyis so// me la sogs pa'i mtshams su bat+tA li dang bat+tA li dang / ba rA la dang ba rAn 
55b8(rgyud 'grel): mu khi rnams kyi khab dang skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang a sho ka'i lo ma dang mda' rnams so// shar sgor lha mo a lo'i rdo rje lugs kyu'o// lhor lha mo ta lo'i rdo rje zhags pa'o// nub tu lha mo ka lo'i rdo rje lug/ 
56a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrog go/ byang du lha mo sad sa lo saM ba mUr d+ha Ti'i rdo rje dril bu'o// 'dir sgo skyong ma'i mtshan ma rnams ni pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// gzhan dag gi ni pad+ma dang zla ba la'o// bsrung ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor la 
56a2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar zla ba la so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i rin po che'i chun po'o// shar du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i 'khor lo'o// lhor sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gsang
56a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa'i rdo rje'o// nub tu sna tshogs pad+ma dang / nyi ma la bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i pad+ma'o// byang du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la rma bya chen mo'i rma bya'i mjug sgo'o// rim pa gnyis par me la
56a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i mtshams su nag mo dang / dus mtshan mo dang / rna ba nag mo dang / dkar mo rnams kyi dung dang / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum rnams so// snam bu rnams la bum pa rnams
56a5(rgyud 'grel): so// shar la sogs pa'i sgor sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i rdo rje lugs kyu la sogs pa bzhi'o// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba la bcom ldan 'das 
56a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dbyings kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po'o// lte ba'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar zla ba rnams la go rims bzhin du g.yas skor du sems ma rdo rje ma dang / rin chen rdo rje ma dang / chos kyi rdo rje ma dang / las
56a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi rdo rje dmar po rtse lnga pa dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rtse mo can gyi rin po che dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i pad+ma 'dab brgyad dkar dmar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog gi sna tshogs rdo rje'o// shar la 
56a8(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la go rims bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag me dang / don yod grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po dang / rdo rje rin po che dang / rdo rje 
56b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje rnams so// mi bskyod pa'i pad+ma'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar zla ba rnams la rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje chags pa dang / rdo rje legs pa rnams kyi rim pa
56b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / mda' dang / rdo rje'o// rin chen 'byung ldan gyi pad+ma la rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje gzi brjid dang / rdo rje tog dang / rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyi rim pa bzhin du rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa 
56b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba dang / nyi ma dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'o// snang ba mtha' yas kyi rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje rgyu dang / rdo rje bsrung ba
56b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi pad+ma dmar po dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i lce'o// don yod grub pa'i rdo rje las dang / rdo rje bsrung ba dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyi sna tshogs rdo rje 
56b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / rdo rje go cha dang / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mche ba dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o// mi bskyod pa la sogs pa so so'i byang chub sems dpa' gsum pa'i mtshan ma ni byang gi 'dab mar dang / bzhi pa'i mtshan ma ni nub kyi 'dab ma
56b6(rgyud 'grel): la bri bar bya'o// me la sogs pa'i pad+ma'i lte ba'i zla ba rnams rdo rje sgeg mo dang / rdo rje 'phreng ba ma dang / rdo rje glu ma dang / rdo rje gar ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang / pi wang dang / rdo rje'o// dbus kyi gzhal
56b7(rgyud 'grel): yas khang las phyi rol gyi snam bu'i shar du byams pa dang / mthong ba don yod dang / ngan song kun 'drin dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros rnams kyi pad+ma dang / zla ba rnams la rdo rje rtse lnga pa
56b8(rgyud 'grel): rnams so// lho phyogs su spos kyi glang po dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / ye shes tog rnams kyi pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje rin po che rnams so// nub tu 'od dpag med dang / zla 'od dang / 
57a1(rgyud 'grel): bzang skyong dang / dra ba can gyi 'od rnams kyi chu skyes dang / zla ba rnams la rdo rje pad+ma rnams so// byang du rdo rje snying po dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / spobs pa rtsegs pa dang / kun tu bzang po rnams kyi pad+ma dang 
57a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba rnams la sna tshogs rdo rje rnams so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i grwa rnams su pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje bdug spos ma dang / rdo rje me tog ma dang / rdo rje mar me ma dang / rdo rje dri chab ma rnams kyi mtshan
57a3(rgyud 'grel): ma ni snga ma bzhin no// shar la sogs pa'i sgor pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams so// snam bu rnams la bum pa rnams 
57a4(rgyud 'grel): so// bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid can 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa lnga ni sngon po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ljang gu dang / ser po ste/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs
57a5(rgyud 'grel): dang // dbus kyi sa thams cad kyang ngo // dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la rtsig pa gsum ste/ sngon po dang / dkar po dang / ser po'o// 'khor lo gsum pa la rtsig pa dkar po gcig go/ de la dbus kyi sa gzhi ser po la sna
57a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la 'jam dpal gyi ral gri yu ba ser po can no// shar la sogs pa'i re mig gi nyi ma rnams la mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje 
57a7(rgyud 'grel): sngon po dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ral gri'o// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i re mig gi zla ba rnams la spyan ma dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma rnams kyi rdo rje ser po dang / rdo rje sngon po dang / 
57a8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dkar po dang / rdo rje ljang gu'o// rim pa gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su zla ba rnams la sems ma rdo rje ma dang / rin chen rdo rje ma dang / chos kyi rdo rje ma dang / las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi
57b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhin no// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su zla ba rnams la tsun d+ha dang / rin chen dkar mda' dang / khro gnyer can dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog ma rnams kyi ral gri dang / rin po che 
57b2(rgyud 'grel): ser po dang / rdo rje dkar po dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog ljang gu rnams so// rim pa gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor la shar gyi zla ba rnams la byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / spos kyi glang po dang / ye shes tog rnams kyi klu
57b3(rgyud 'grel): shing gi yal ga me tog dang bcas pa dang / ral gri dang / lag ldan gyi snam bu la gnas pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu ser po'o// lho'i zla ba rnams la bzang skyong dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / 
57b4(rgyud 'grel): spobs pa brtsegs pa rnams kyi mda' dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / ljang gu'o// nub kyi zla ba rnams la mthu chen thob dang / ngan song kun 'dren dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'jobs 
57b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i blo gros dang / drab can gyi 'od rnams kyi pad+ma dkar po dang / mda' dkar po dang / mda' ser po dang / ut+pal dmar po la gnas pa'i nyi ma'o// byang phyogs kyi zla ba rnams la zla 'od dang / 'od dpag med dang / 
57b6(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams kyi ut+pal la gnas pa'i zla ba dang / bum pa dmar po dang / mda' ser po dang / mda' sngon po'o// 'dir go rims bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i 
57b7(rgyud 'grel): sgo rnams kyi logs gnyis kyi snam bul mtshan ma gnyis gnyis so// shar la sogs pa'i sgor nyi ma rnams la gshin rje mthar byed dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / rta mgrin dang / bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rnams kyi/ 
57b8(rgyud 'grel): ral gri yu ba nag po can dang / rdo rje ser po dang / rdo rje dbyug pa dmar po dang / ral gri yu ba sngon po can dang / dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi nyi ma rnams la mi g.yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / dbyug pa/ 
58a1(rgyud 'grel): sngon po dang / stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri sngon po dang / rdo rje sngon po dang / rdo rje dbyug pa sngon po dang / rdo rje dbyug pa sngon po'o// gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi rol du nyi ma la gnod mdzes kyi ral gri'o// rta mgrin gyi mtshan/ 
58a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i phyi ngos su nyi ma la rdo rjes 'og gi rdo rje lcags kyu'o// zla ba dang nyi ma thams cad kyi 'og tu sna tshogs chu skyes so// snam bu rnams la bum pa rnams so// kha cig tu ni gshin rjegashed kyi mtshan ma'i byingos su nyi ma la gtsug tor 
58a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'khor lo dang de'i phyi ngos su gnod mdzes kyi ral gri'o zhes gsungs so// chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la nang gi 'khor lo chen dkar pos dgang bar bya'o// gzhan ni snga ma bzhin 
58a4(rgyud 'grel): no// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba la 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ral gri yub ser po can no// shar la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab mi'i zla ba rnams la go rims bzhin 
58a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas bskor du gtsug tor chen po dang / gdugs dkar po dang / gzi brjid phung po dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba dang / 'phags pa dang / cher 'phags pa dang / rgyal ba ste 
58a6(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor brgyad po rnams kyi 'khor lo ser po rnams so// shar gyi re mig gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje sngon po'o// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla 
58a7(rgyud 'grel): brnams la rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje chags pa dang / rdo rje legs pa rnams kyi rdo rje dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / mda' dang / rdo rje'o// lho'i re mig gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma dang / nyi ma la rin 
58a8(rgyud 'grel): chen 'byung ldan gyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu ser po'i rgyal mtshan no// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi sna tshogs chu skyes dang / zla ba la rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje nyi ma dang / rdo rje tog dang / rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyi rdo rje
58b1(rgyud 'grel): rtse lnga pa gnyis kyi mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'o// nub kyi re mig gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma la snang
58b2(rgyud 'grel): ba mtha' yas kyi badz+rad par bal// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje nod pa dang / dzaHd+ha dang / rdo rje bsrung ba rnams kyi pad+ma dang / ral gri dang / 
58b3(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo dang / rdorje rtsegacig pa'i mug// zung phyogs kyi mig gi dbus sus tshogs pad+ma bani bal rgan yang grub pa'i ma grog/ dbang ldan ma sogs pa'i ma mas sug tshogs pad+ma thab rnams la 
58b4(rgyud 'grel): rdorje las dang / rdo rje bsrung ba dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyi rdo rje rtsa gsum pa dang / rdo rje go cha dang / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mche ba dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi 
58b5(rgyud 'grel): mig gi pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la spyan pa dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / mi bskyod pa dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa'i 
58b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma bzhin no// shar la sogs pa'i sgor sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'o// nang gi 
58b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'di las dkyil 'khor gnyis par shar phyogs su sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la sa bcu gnyis so// mos pa spyod pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od 'byed pa dang / 'od 'phro 
58b8(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / sbyang dka' ba dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin dang / kun tu 'od kyi sa rnams kyi go rims bzhin du g.yas skor du pad+ma dmar po dang / 
59a1(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang / ut+pal dang / nor bu mar gta dang / pad+ma la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang / sna tshogs 
59a2(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes kyi steng du sna tshogs rdo rje yu ba dang bcas pa'i pad+ma dang / zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po dang / ut+pa la'i steng du ral gri dang / chos kyi sprin gyis yongs su bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
59a3(rgyud 'grel): po ti dang / pad+ma la bzhugs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku'o// lhor sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rin po che pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / 
59a4(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis rnams kyi pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 
59a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang 'brang tshogs pa'i rin bca'i ske ma dang / la ba dang bcas pa'i a sho ka' matog gi rlan pa dang / pad+mA dgang po dang / At+pal sngon po dang / pad+ma dkar pa dang / pad+ma la gnas pa'i shes rab 
59a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang / chu skyes ser po la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang / ut+pal la gnas pa'i ral gri dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang / rin po che sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub 
59a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi shing gi yal ga dang / ut+pal la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o// rab tu sna tshogs chu skyes dang / zla ba rnams la tshe dang / sems dang / yo byad dang / las dang / skye ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mos pa dang / 
59a8(rgyud 'grel): smon lam dang / ye shes dang / chos la dbang ba rnams dang / de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste/ dbang bcu gnyis rnams kyi nang bu pad+ma rA ga la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i 
59b1(rgyud 'grel): tshe dpag med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rdo rje dmar po rtse lnga pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang / me tog dzA ti kha dog sna tshogs pa'i yal 'dab dang / pad+ma la gnas 
59b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang / praM yang ku'i me tog gi snye pa dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / ut+pal la gnas pa'i ral gri dang / pad+ma la gnas pa'i bum pa bzang po dang / 'dam skyes dkar po dang / chu skyes ser po 
59b3(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o// byang phyogs su sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la dbyig gi blo gros ma dang / rin po che'i skar mda' dang / gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dang / 'od zer can dang / ri khrod lo ma can dang / 
59b4(rgyud 'grel): dza gu mI dang / mtha' yas ma dang / skal byed pa dang / shes rab phel ma dang / las dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ma dang / ye shes mi zad pa'i zam tog dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 
59b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzod ldan pa rnams te/ gzugs bcu gnyis rnams kyi 'bras kyi ske ma dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu zla ba chu shel gyi bum pa dang / skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang / rma bya'i mjug sgo 
59b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / dug gi me tog gi chun po dang / pad+ma dmar po la gnas pa'i mi zad pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs la phreng ba dpyangs pa dang / ut+pal sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri dang / rdo rje rtse gsum 
59b7(rgyud 'grel): bas mtshan pa'i pad+ma dkar dpar dang / rin po che'i za ma tog dang / pad+ma la gnas pa'i rin po che sna tshogs pa'i dpe slob mo// shar la sogs pa'i sgor chu skyes dang / nyi ba rnams la chos so so yang dag par 
59b8(rgyud 'grel): rig pa dang / dor so so yang dag par rag pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rin po che'i zhags pa dang / mtha' gnyis su bad+mas 
60a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa'i lugs sgrog dang / rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i dril bu'o// me la sogs pa'i mtshams su sgeg mo dang / phreng ba ma dang / glu ma dang / gar ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang / rin po che'i phreng ba 
60a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / pi wang dang / rdo rje'o// dkyil 'khor gsum par pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la shar phyogs su kun tu bzang po'i ut+pal la gnas pa'i ral gri dang / blo gros mi zad pa'i ral gri dang / sa'i snying po'i pad+ma la gnas
60a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang / nam mkha'i snying po'i rin po che'o// lho phyogs su nam mkha' mdzod kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / phyog na rin chen gyi rin po che dang / blo gros rgya mtsho'i dung dang / rdo rje snying po'i rdo rje'o// 
60a4(rgyud 'grel): nub tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma dang / mthu chen thob kyi ral gri dang / zla 'od kyi rdo rje dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo dang / dra ba can gyi 'od kyi ral gri'o// byang du pad+ma dang nyi ma rnams la 'od dpag med dang / spobs/ 
60a5(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs pa dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams can nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / sgrib pa thams can rnam par sel ba rnams kyi sna tshogs pad+ma dang pad+ma la gnas pa'i ral gri dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / ral 
60a6(rgyud 'grel): gri'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgor pad+ma dang zla ba nyi ma rnams la shin rje mthar byed dang / shes rab mthar byed dang / pad+ma mthar byed dang / bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lugs sgrog 
60a7(rgyud 'grel): dang / dril bu rnams so// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma rnams la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba dang / he ru ka rdo rje dang / rta mchog 
60a8(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / sna tshogs rdo rje rnams so// gshin rje mthar byed kyi mtshan ma'i phyir gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'khor lo ser po'o// pad+ma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma'i phyir
60b1(rgyud 'grel): gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bzhi'i byi ngos su dkyil 'khor gsum pa kho na'i zur gyi nang du re khA bya'o// de'i phyi ngos kyi gnas kyi me la sogs pa'i 
60b2(rgyud 'grel): zur thig rnams kyi g.yas logs su gnas pa'i pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la me tog ma dang / bdug spos ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri chab ma rnams kyi me tog gi snod dang / spos phor dang / rin po che'i sgrol ma'i 
60b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod sdong dang dung ngo // g.yon logs su gnas pa'i pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje gzugs ma dang / rdo rje sgyu ma dang / rdo rje ro ma dang / rdo rje reg bya ma rnams kyi me long dang / bi wang dang / ro'i snod dang / gos sna 
60b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs so// phyi rol rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la pad+ma rnams la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dbang po dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / lus ngan po rnams kyi rdo rje dang / dbyug pa dang / gru'i zhags 
60b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / lcags kyu'o// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su dbang ldan dang / me lha dang / srin po'i bdag po dang / rlung lha rnams kyi tshe gsum pa dang / blugs gzar dang / ral gri dang / rlung ras so// de nas 
60b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan gyi phyi ngos dang nye bar dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams te/ mtshan ma rnams rims kyis par bya'o// de la tshangs pa'i bgrang phreng ngo // khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'o// dbang phyug chen po'i rtse 
60b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa dang / gdong drug gi shag ti dang / tshangs mo'i phreng ba dang / drag mo'i rtse gsum dang / khub 'jug ma'i 'khor lo dang / gzhon nu ma'i shag ti dang / dbang mo'i rdo rje dang / phag mo'i nya ro hi ta dang / 
60b8(rgyud 'grel): tsa mun Da'i gri gug dang / 'bring gi ri ti'i phreng ba dang / tshegs bdag gi dgra sta dang / nag po chen po'i rtse gsum dang / dga' byed dbang phyug gi rdza rnga dang / nyi ma'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / zla ba'i 
61a1(rgyud 'grel): kun ta ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / mig dmar gyi gri skur dang / lag pa'i mda' dang / phur bu'i phreng ba dang / pa wa sangs kyi phreng ba dang / spen pa'i dbyug pa nag po dang / sgra gcan gyi 
61a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba dang / mjug rings kyi klu'i zhags pa dang / stobs bzangs kyi gshol dang / rgyal bar byed pa'i me tog gi phreng ba dang / sbrang rtsir byed pa'i chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang / dpyid kyi bla dang / mtha' yas dang / 
61a3(rgyud 'grel): nau byas dang / 'jog po dang / stabs kyi d+hA dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen pa dang / dung skyong dang / rigs ldan rnams kyi thal ma sbyar ba'am// yang na rang rangadage pa'i mtshan ma dnga'adra ba'i mtshan ma'o// das 
61a4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas dang rig ldan ni bram ze ste mo lha'i bu'o// nor rgyas dang dung skyong ni rgyal rigs te dbang po'i'o// 'jog po dang pad+ma chen po ni rje'u'i rigs te rlung lha'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma ni dmar rigs te chu 
61a5(rgyud 'grel): lha'i'o// thag bzangs ris dang / stobs ldan dang / rab tu tshim byed dang / rnam par snang byed la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi ral gri la sogs pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'o// nam ma
61a6(rgyud 'grel): lding gi dbang po'i thal mo sbyar ba'o// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i pi wang ngo // dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa'i pi wang ngo // rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po don kun grub pa'i me tog gi phreng ba'o// gang ba bzang po
61a7(rgyud 'grel): dang / nor bu bzang po dang nor sbyin dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / tsi pi kut+tA li dang / ki li mA li dang / sgo'i dbang po dang / spyad pa'i dbang po ste/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams kyi shing tog dzi b+hur rnams so// 
61a8(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog ma'i chang bu gnyis so// tha skar dang / bra nye dang / smin drug dang / snar ma dang / mgo dang / lag dang / nabs so dang / rgyal dang / skag dang / ma chu dang / gri dang / dbo dang / me bzhi dang / nag pa dang / 
61b1(rgyud 'grel): sa ri dang / sa ga dang / lha mtshams dang / snron dang / sbubs dang / chu stod dang / chu smad dang / gro bzhin dang / mon gre dang / mon gru dang / khrums stod dang / khrums smad dang / nam gru dang / byi bzhin rnams kyi 
61b2(rgyud 'grel): ni lag pa thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya rnams so// 'dir yang sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'o// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa la bum pa rnams so// ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje phreng ba sngon 
61b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i nang du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad po'i dbus su tshes kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ser po'o// shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams las gnon gyi phyag rgya dkar po dang / mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya sngon po dang / bsam
61b4(rgyud 'grel): gtan gyi phyag rgya dmar po dang / mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya ljang gu rnams so// me la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams la nyi ma dang / yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / ral gri dang / gdags sa// rdo rje phreng ba'i 
61b5(rgyud 'grel): phyi'i me la sogs pa'i mtshams su sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'o// shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la sgo'i g.yon du mtshan ma gnyis te/ g.yas su yang ngo / der klu shing gi me tog dang / spyan dang bcas/ 
61b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chu skyes dang / lugs kyu dang / dbyug pa dang / dung dang / ral gri dang / pad+ma la gnas pa'i chos kyi sgrom dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang / pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla 
61b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzugs dang / rin po che dang / rdo rje gur dang / rdo rje dang bcas pa'i ut+pal dang / bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang / chu skyes la gnas pa'i rin po che dang / rin po che'i snye ma'o// me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnam 
61b8(rgyud 'grel): lame tog la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams so// sgo rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams so// mtshan ma sum cu rtsa bdun po rnams sna tshogs pad+ma dang / zla ba la gnas pa'o// mgrin pa sngon po la sa 
62a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mi bri ba yang ngo // 'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor la rtsig pa lnga dang / shar la sogs pa'i sa ni dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / nag po'o// 
62a2(rgyud 'grel): thig gi re khA gsum ni dkar po dang / dmar po dang / nag po'o// thig gi re khA gcig dang / rdo rje phreng ba'i re khA gnyis ni nag po'o// nang gi pho brang gi dbus kyi re mig la sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la bcom ldan
62a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das 'byung po 'dul byed kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po'o// shar du nyi ma la dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum pa'o// lhor nyi ma la khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'o// nub tu zla ba la tshangs pa'i 'phreng ba'o// byang du nyi ma la 
62a4(rgyud 'grel): smin drug gi bu'i shag ti'o// dbang ldan du zla ba la tshegs bdag gi dgra sta'o// mer nyi ma la nyi ma'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// bden bral du nyi ma la sgra gcan gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// 
62a5(rgyud 'grel): rlung du zla ba la dga' byed dbang phyug gi cang ti'u'o// rim pa gnyis par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dbang po dang / thig le mchog ma dang / zla ba mo dang / dka' bzlog ma rnams kyi zla ba la pad+ma dkar po dang / 
62a6(rgyud 'grel): spos phor dang / mang mo'i mchod sdong dang / gdengs ka'i rnam pa'i lag pa'o// me la sogs par rin chen dpal mo dang / dbyangs can ma dang / lha mdzes ma dang / kun tu 'byor ma rnams kyi zla ba rnams la rim 
62a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin du dri'i dung chos dang / pi wang dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje rtse gsum pa'o// rim pa gsum par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dbang po dang / gshin rje dang / chu ba dag dang / lus ngan rnams
62a8(rgyud 'grel): kyi zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang / nyi ma la gnas pa'i thos pas mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dang / zla ba la gnas pa'i klu'i zhags pa dang / zla ba la gnas pa'i dbyug to'o// me la sogs pa'i mtshams su me lha dang / 
62b1(rgyud 'grel): bden bral dang / rlung lha dang / zla ba rnams kyi nyi ma la gnas pa'i phreng ba dang / nyi ma la gnas pa'i ral gri dang / zla ba la gnas pa'i rlung ras dang / zla ba dang / ku mu ta la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// zla/ 
62b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mtshan ma dang / nye bar dbang ldan gyi nyi ma la rtse gsum mo// rim pa bzhi par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su seng ge'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin ma dang / rnam rgyas ma dang / pad chen ma dang / chang 'phrog ma rnams kyi 
62b3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba la seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang / lcags kyu dang / mda' dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o// dbang ldan la sogs par mchog 'phrog ma dang / rin chen dbang phyug ma dang / rgyal ma dang / 'gro skyong ma rnams kyi zla ba 
62b4(rgyud 'grel): la me tog gi snod dang / spos por dang / dri'i dung ches dang / mar me'i mchod stong ngo // 'dir nyi ma dang / zla ba thams cad na sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'o// rim pa bzhi par bum pa rnams so// mkha' 'gro lnga'i dkyil 
62b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su shes rab dang bcas pa'i kye'i rdo rje'i gri gug dang thos pa'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgor dkar mo dang / chom rkun ma dang / ro langs ma dang / za bong ma rnams kyi rdo rje 
62b6(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu rnams so// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su sbos mo dang / ri khrod ma dang / gtum mo dang / g.yung mo rnams kyi byang chub sems kyi bum pa dang / 
62b7(rgyud 'grel): ri rab dang / me khab dang / rgyal mtshan chen po'i ba dan no// de las shar gyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rtag pa'i thod pa la gnas pa'i rma bya'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgor skam pa mo dang / zhags pa ma dang / dol zlum
62b8(rgyud 'grel): ma dang / lcags kyu 'dzin ma rnams kyi skam pa dang / zhags pa dang / nyargya zlub po dang / lcags kyu'o// dbang ldan la sogs par me tog ma dang / bdug spos ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri chab ma rnams kyi me tog go/ 
63a1(rgyud 'grel): snod dang / spos por dang / mar me'i mchod sdong dang / dri ser pos gang ba'i dung ngo // lho'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rdo rje nyi ma'i thod pa la gnas pa'i bya kar na da ka dang / shar la sogs 
63a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgor nyi lag ma dang / mar me ma dang / rin chen skar mda' ma dang / phyag na glog thogs me rnams kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / mar me'i mchod sdong dang / rin po che dang / glog gi phreng ba'o// dbang ldan 
63a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs par sgeg mo dang / phreng ba ma dang / glu ma dang / gad ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang / mkhar rnga dang / rdo rje'o// nub kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi thod pa la 
63a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i dom dang / shar la sogs pa'i sgor pad+ma ma dang / chos 'byung ma dang / sgrog ma dang / dang mkhyud ma rnams kyi pad+ma dang / chos 'byung dang / sgrog dang / rdo rje'o// dbang ldan la sogs par gling bu ma dang / 
63a5(rgyud 'grel): pi wang ma dang / rnga mu kut+ta ma dang / rdza rnga ma rnams kyi rang rang gi rol cha rnams so// byang gi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rta mchog gi thod pa la gnas pa'i gza' lhag dang / shar la sogs pa'i sgor sgo lcags ma 
63a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / lde skyog ma dang / sgo glegs ma dang / yol ba 'dzin ma rnams kyi sgo lcags dang / lde skyog dang / sgo glegs dang / yol ba'o// dbang ldan la sogs par spyan ma dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / 
63a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma rnams kyi 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pa la'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khod chen po'i sgo rnams su dkar mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams dang / dbang ldan la sogs par spos mo la sogs pa'i mtshan 
63a8(rgyud 'grel): me rnams so// mtshan ma 'di rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// rtag pa kho na'i zla ba la gnas pa'o// dkyil 'khor so so la bdud rtsi'i bum pa rnams so// kha cig ni dkyil 'khor chen po kho 
63b1(rgyud 'grel): na la'o zhes so// 'khor lo sgyur ba drug gi dkyil 'khor la mtshan ma rnams sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa ste/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro kho na'i zla ba la gnas pa'o// gzhal yas khang drug po rnams kyi grwa 
63b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam kyi su sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i thod pa rnams so// de la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi pad+ma la rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje'o// mtshams kyi pad+ma rnams la mkha' 'gro ma dang / lA ma dang / dum skyes 
63b3(rgyud 'grel): ma dang / gzugs can ma rnams kyi cang te'u rnams so// 'dir dgod pa'i rim pa ni shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su g.yon skor dang / me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su g.yas skor ro// sgo'i pad+ma rnam 
63b4(rgyud 'grel): la thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab tu gtum mo dag dang / keng rus chen po dang / gtum pa'i mig can ma dag dang / keng rus dang / 'od ldan ma dag dang / mche ba rnam par gtsigs ma dang / sna chen ma dag gi rdo
63b5(rgyud 'grel): rje bzhi'o// khor yug gi dbus su rdo rje'i phreng ba'o// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du dbus su pad+ma la 'khor lo dang / sgo'i pad+ma rnams la lha dgra dang / dpa' bo'i blo ma dag dang / 'od dpag med dang / 
63b6(rgyud 'grel): mi thung ma dag dang / rdo rje 'od dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dag dang / rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma dag gi 'khor lo rnams so// khor yug gi dbus su 'khor lo'i phreng ba'o// rin chen mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor 
63b7(rgyud 'grel): la dbus su rin po che'o// sgo'i chu skyes rnams la nyu gu can dang / er pa ti dag dang / rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo dag dang / dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung shugs ma dag dang / rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / 
63b8(rgyud 'grel): chang thung ma dag gi rin po che rnams so// khor yug gi dbus su rin po che'i phreng ba'o// pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su pad+ma'o// sgo'i pad+ma rnams la shing tu bzang po dang / lha mo sngo sangs
64a1(rgyud 'grel): ma dag dang / rdo rje bzang po dang / shin tu bzang mo dag dang / 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta sna ma dag dang / mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma rnams kyi pad+ma rnams so// khor yug gi dbus su pad+ma'i 
64a2(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'o// sgo'i pad+ma rnams la stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dag dang / rin chen rdo rje dang / dum skyes ma dag dang / rta mgrin dang / 
64a3(rgyud 'grel): chang tshod ma dag dang / na mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma dag gi rdo rje rnams so// khor yug gi dbus su rdo rje'i phreng ba'o// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'o// sgo'i
64a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rnams pa rke duka dang shin tu dbab mo dag dang / pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen mo dag dang / rnam par snad mdzad dang / 'khor los skur ma dag dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen pa 
64a5(rgyud 'grel): dag gi sna tshogs rdo rje rnams so// khor yug gi dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'o// gzhal yas khang chen po'i sgo rnams la khra gdong ma dang / 'ug gdong ma dang / khyi gdong ma dang / phag gdong ma rnams kyi rdo rje 
64a6(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu'o// mtshams rnams su gshin rje brtan ma dang / gshin rje pho nya ma dang / gshin rje mche ba ma dang / gshin rje 'joms ma rnams kyi me long dang / pi 
64a7(rgyud 'grel): wang dang / dri'i dung dang / ro'i snod rnams so// bum pa rnams ni ji ltar rig par ro// de ltar brjod pa'i rjes su 'brangs te dkyil 'khor gzhan rnams la rdul tshon dgye ba yang shes par bya ste/ gzhung mangs pas
64a8(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pas ma bstan to// dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la ni tshon gyi kha dog gi rim pa bshad pa dag dang phal cher mi mthun pas/ rdul tshon gyi kha dog gi rim pa brjod par bya'o// thugs kyi dkyil
64b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis pa'i bar gyi nang gis thams cad ni nag po'o// thugs dang / gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi shar gyi sa thams cad ni nag po'o// lho ni dmar po'o// nub ni ser po'o// 
64b2(rgyud 'grel): byang ni dkar po'o// stegs bu ni dkar po'o// rin chen snam bu ni dmar po ste// de la rin po che sna tshogs pas spras pa'o// dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i sa ni nag po ste/ de la dra ba dang dra ba phyed ni dkar po'o// 
64b3(rgyud 'grel): kha dog dkar po la sogs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje phreng ba dang / ka ba bcu drug ni nag po ste/ shar du ral gri nag po dang / lhor rin po che dmar po dang / nub tu 'khor lo ser po dang / byang du pad+ma dkar po rnams dang ldan 
64b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// bum pa brgyad ni pad+ma la gnas shing dkar po ste/ pad+mas kha brgyan pa'o// thams cad du pad+ma'i gdan gyi sum cha ni lte ba'o// rdo rje phreng ba gnyis bzhi ljang gu'o// lha sna ma ni dkar po'o// rtsig pa'i re khA/ 
64b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum ni nang nas brtsams nas dkar po dang dmar po dang nag po'o// de rnams kyis ni cha dgur byas te/ de la che re dor nas cha gnyis la re khA so so bya'o// sgo dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams su rdo rje dang rin po ches
64b6(rgyud 'grel): spras pa'o// rta babs bcu gnyis ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'o// gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dkar po'o// de'i pad+ma brgyad ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang bral ba ste/ phyogs rnams su dmar po dang / mtshams
64b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams su dkar po'o// re khA lnga'i kha dog ni nang nas brtsams te ljang gu dang / nag po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ser po rnams so// de rnams kyi sa cha bco lngar byas te der snga ma bzhin re khA bya'o// 
65a1(rgyud 'grel): su'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams ni dkar po'o// de'i pad+ma rnams ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang bral ba'o// re khA lnga ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin no// rta babs kyi ka ba rnams kyi 'og gi stegs bu'i gnas 
65a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams su sbrul gyi gdan rnams te/ so sor cha chung bcu gnyis so// de la shar gyi phyogs su nag po zlum po gnyis kyi steng du rgyal mtshan gnyis so// lhor gru gsum dmar po gnyis la bkra shis kyis mtshan 
65a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// nub tu gru bzhi ser po gnyis la rdo rjes mtshan pa'o// byang du zla ba phyed pa'i rnam par dkar po gnyis pa la pad+mas mtshan pa'o// shar gyi g.yas kyi zlum po'i g.yas su klu'i rgyal po rgyal ba zhes pa'i 
65a4(rgyud 'grel): bdud bci'i bum pa'o// nub kyi g.yon gyi gru bzhi pa'i g.yon du rnam par rgyal ba zhes pa'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa'o// shar gyi rta babs kyi rim pa dang po'i myos pa srung ba'i steng gi dbus kyi gru bzhi pa la chos 
65a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo nag po// de'i g.yas dang g.yon du ri dgas dang ri dgas mo nag po'o// lhor bum pa bzang po dmar po'o// de'i g.yas dang g.yon du dung dang / pad+ma dmar po'o// nub tu byang chub kyi shing 
65a6(rgyud 'grel): ser po'o// de'i g.yas dang g.yon dag tu mi'am ci dang mi bam ci mo ser po'o// gyang du rnga bo che dkar po ste de'i g.yas dang g.yon du dbug pa dang thob dkar po'o// mda' yab dang sa'i khor yug gi
65a7(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi sa ni nag po'o// der ji ltar mdzes par mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bri bar bya'o// sa'i khor yug ni ser po'o// der dbang ldan gyi mtshams su zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba cha chung bcu 
65a8(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa dang / bden bral du nub bzhin pa'i nyi ma cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o// chu'i khor yug dkar po'o// me'i khor yug dmar po'o// rlung gi khor yug nag po'o// me dang rlung gi khor yug de dag gi 
65b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus su so sor cha chung bcu gnyis pa'i rtsibs brgyad pa'i dur khrod kyi 'khor lo brgyad de/ phyogs su dmar po rnams dang / mtshams su dkar po rnams so// shar gyi 'khor lo'i phyi ngos su stong pa'i dkyil 
65b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ro// nub kyi 'khor lo'i phyi ngos su yang stong pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// stong pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis 'dri ba ni sgrub thabs kyi le'ur gsung ba'i tshul gyis so// bcu char la yang mtshan ma ni gri gug go/ 
65b3(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi khor yug la mtshan ma sna tshogs pa bri bar bya ste/ 'dir 'dod pa spyod pa ni ma yin no// nam mkha'i khor yug ni nag pa'o// de'i logs gnyis su cha chung gsum gsum dor la der re khA zlum skor 
65b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis so// dbus kyi cha chung drug la ni rdo rje phreng ba ljang gu bya'o// 'od zer 'bar ba rnams ni kha dog rnam pa lnga'o// yang nang gi dkyil 'khor du shar phyogs kyi tshon nag po'i dpangs su nas kyi bzhi cha 
65b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig go/ lho'i dmar po ni gnyis so// nub kyi ser po ni bzhi'o// byang gi dkar po ni gsum mo// rtsig pa'i re khA rnams kyi dpangs su rdul tshon ser po sum 'gyur ro// rdo rje phreng ba rnams kyang ngo // re khA 
65b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ni tshon ser po las nyis 'gyur ro// pad+ma rnams ni snam bu las nyid 'gur gyis so// nyi zla dag ni chu skyes kyi re khA las so// de ltar brjod pa'i dpangs las gsung gi dkyil 'khor la dpangs ni 
65b7(rgyud 'grel): nyis 'gyur ro// de rnams las nyis 'gyur ni sku'i dkyil 'khor la'o// mda' yab las phyi'i mchod pa'i sa la ni nas gcig go/ sa la sogs pa'i khor yug dang re khA zlum skor gnyis kyi dpangs ni
65b8(rgyud 'grel): sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa'i re khA'i tshad du'o// sa thams cad du rdul tshon gzhan dgyes pa thams cad ni nyis 'gyur gyi dbye bas mnyam pa'o// de la gtso bo'i lte bar lte ba dang mnyam pa'i dkar po dang / 
66a1(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i zla ba dang nyi ma dang / sgra can dang dus kyi me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i rdo rje sngon po rtse gsum pa'o// shar gyi 'dab ma la
66a2(rgyud 'grel): spos phor nag po'o// lhor mar me dmar po'o// nub tu dung ser po'o// byang du lhab shos dkar po'o// me la sogs par rnga yab nag po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ser po'o// de'i phyi ngos su 
66a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan du chos kyi dung dkar po'o// mer yid bzhin gyi nor bu nag po'o// bden bral du chos kyi gan+thi dmar po'o// rlung du dpag bsam gyi shing ser po'o// rim pa gnyis par shar du pad+ma dkar por 
66a4(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma la ral gri nag po'o// mer pad+ma dmar por zla ba la ut+pal sngon po'o// lhor pad+ma dkar por nyi ma la rin po che cha dgu pa dmar po'o// bden bral du pad+ma dmar por zla ba la pad+ma dmar po'o// nub tu parma 
66a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar por nyi ma la 'khor lo ser po'o// rlung du pad+ma dmar par zlab la 'khor lo ser po'o// byang du pad+ma dkar por nyi ma la pad+ma dkar po'o// dbang ldan du pad+ma dmar por zla ba la ut+pal dkar ba'o// 
66a6(rgyud 'grel): rim pa gsum pa'i snam bu la sgo so so'i logs gnyis su gnyis te de ltar pad+ma brgyad do// de la drug rnams nyi ma la'o// nub dang brang gi sgo'i g.yon dag tu zla ba gnyis so// mtshams rnams su 
66a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang zla ba bzhi ste de rnams su dbang ldan nas brtsams te me long dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / gos dang rdo rje dang / rin po che dang rdo rje dang ro'i snod dang / chos 'byung dang / 'khor lo dang / dri'i dung
66a8(rgyud 'grel): dang / pi wang dang / pad+ma rnams te/ dkar po dang / sngon po dang / nag po dang / nag po dang / ljang gu dang / dmar po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / ser po dang / ser po dang / sngon po dang / dkar po'o//

70b7(rgyud 'grel): ba blangs te sku gzugs la sogs pa dang / lhan cig yon bdag slob ma bzhin du rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnams kyang gang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o// slob dpon gyis 
70b8(rgyud 'grel): kyang skra gzugs la sogs pa'i lhag pa'i lha'i mtshan ma 'am de'i rigs kyi bdag po'i mtshan ma la re/ tog dgul du gzhag go/ yang na re/ tog dor ba med pa nyid du ska gabrags la sogs pa dkyil 
71a1(rgyud 'grel): bya// 'khor mthong ba nyid kyi gzhug pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i phyi ros shar gyi phyogs smra'am der skabs med na dbang ldan du hacad me ring ba'i yid du'ong ba'i gnas su khrus kyi stegs 
71a2(rgyud 'grel): bu gru bzhi pa dpangs su khru gnyis pa'o// yang na srid du khru brgyad pa de'i phyed du mtho ba dang yang na srid du khru gnyis pa de'i byed du mtho ba ste/ sa sel la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang bral ba'i sa las byas pa'am 
71a3(rgyud 'grel): so phag la sogs pas byas pa'am de med na ni ji ltar rnyed pa'am/ ji ltar gnas pa'i sa gzhi yang rung ste/ 'bras btags pa'i khu ba la sogs pas bris pa'i stegs bu phyogs dang mtshams su bum pa brgyang 
71a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pa shin tu 'jam pa bdud rje dang bcas pa'i nam lnga la sogs pas thugs pa tha rus dang / gdugs dkar ba dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / bum pa gang ba dang / me tog dang / ger dang / g+ha dang

76a1(rgyud 'grel): dpon gyi dbang ngo // thabs skyes bu can de'i thabs la byung ba 'di yin zhing skyes bu can ni dri ma dang bral ba'i dbang ste/ gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes so// dbang bzhi pa'i bdag nyid ni 'di'i 
76a2(rgyud 'grel): mthar thug yin pas// skyes bu can gyi mtha' dbang gi cho ga zhes pa'i don to// dge ba la spro ba phul du byung ba'i ngo bo skyes bu byed pa kho na las cig shos kyi 'bras bu gsum gsal bar 'gyur ro snyam du 
76a3(rgyud 'grel): dgongs pas skyes bu can gyi mtha' zhes gsungs so// sbyor ba ni 'dir kun rdzob kyi shes rab dang / don dam pa'i shes rab dang sbyor ba dgongs so zhes pa gsum gyi bdag nyid ni dri ma bral ba'o// gzhan 
76a4(rgyud 'grel): yang sku gzugs la sogs pa'i gzugs su gsal bar bsgoms pa'i lha'i sku rnam par dag pa ni slob dpon gyi dbang gis bstan to// gsung dang thugs dag pa'i don du gsang ba la sogs pa 
76a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin por bya ba nyid pa// b+h+ya chubs mas dpe' tshan pa rnams pa yang 'di rnams par // de spyad drug sungs pa/ rang ba ldan du bang smyan thug la mchogs bkug/ ces padag / bamamaldan 
76a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dis don grub byang chub shing gi rtsa bar 'dug pa la nam mkha' bzhugs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'dus byas pa gsal nas mtshan phyed na bla na med 
76a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i shes rab gtad de/ shes rab dang dbang bzhi pa dag byin no zhes so// de ltar dgongs pa kho nas slob ma'i rab gnas bzhin du sku gzugs la sogs pa'i rab gnas bya'o// zhes shing rta chen po rnams 
76a8(rgyud 'grel): kyi khyad med par gsungs so// de nas sku gzugs la sogs pa'i lnga rnams la rang rang gi snying po'i sngags kyis na bza' la sogs dbul bar bya'o// yang nA e AHbadz+ra bA sa se hUM swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra 
76b1(rgyud 'grel): puSh+pe hUM swAhA/ oM AHbadz+ra d+hU pe hUM swAhA/ oM AHbadz+ra d+hU pi hUM swAhA/ oM AHbadz+ra ne bid+ya hUM swAhA/ oM AHbadz+ra gan+d+he hUM swAH/ oM sarba a ba ra NA bi b+hu Sha Ne swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di rnams kyis so// oM 
76b2(rgyud 'grel): AHsarba sho d+ha ni hUM phaT/ 'bras bu dang me tog la sogs pa da ngos po sna tshogs pa gsang ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ri swA hA/ 'bras bu dbul ba'i sngags so// dam tshig rdzas dang gI haM yang phul te/ oM badz+ra 
76b3(rgyud 'grel): satwa a zhes pa'i sngags kyi me long bstan to// de'i rjes la ma sbyin bsreg yod na sbyin bsreg gis tshim par byas pa'i rjes la yon bdag la sogs pa zhi ba la sogs pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthar thugs pa'i don 
76b4(rgyud 'grel): mngon par 'dod pas sku gzugs la sogs pa dang rjes su mthun zhing / yon bdag gi bsam pa dang btun nas drug gam/ gcig las mi nyung ba'i gser gyi thur ma dngul gyi skong bur bzhag pa'i 
76b5(rgyud 'grel): mar dang sbrang rtsi bskus pas/ oM tsak+Sha tsak+ShaHsa man+ta tsak+Sharbi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ zhes brjod cing mig sman gyi sku gzugs kyi spyan dbye bar bya'o// po ti la sogs pa'i lha la ni me long la gzugs brnyan 
76b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pa la'o// zhi ba la sogs po'i don du yon bdog la sogs pa la gzigs pa lhur byed pa'i lhag pa'i lhamos par bya'i// de'i rjes su thab khung gi me la ma 'dzi'i steng du gnas pa'i snod du dgang
76b7(rgyud 'grel): gzar dang blugs gzar gyis sam/ de med na shing pi pra la'i 'dab mas 'bras ma bkrugs pa dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang sha kha ra rnams dang bsres pa'i 'o ma blugs la rang gi bdag po'i sngags
76b8(rgyud 'grel): 'gyeng ba dang bcas pas zlos shing 'o thug bsgrub par bya'o// sbyin pasreg gi thab khung med na me gzhan la'o// 'othug de la/ oM dai b+han+de sa mA d+hi d+han pre Na ne swA hA/ zhes sngags nas brjod cing / sku

77b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba che// rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog/ snyan pa rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje nam mkha' dri med mkha'// rang bzhin dgu bgos pa med// rdo rje su khyod

77b8(rgyud 'grel): nas zhi dang rgyas pa dang // rtag tu bkra shis mdzad du gsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas slar// 'dir ni byin par mdzad du gsol// zhes lan gsum gsol ba btab nas/ phyogs kyi gtor ma rnams/ 
78a1(rgyud 'grel): \u0f7f// dang / 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma dbul lo// yon bdag gis kyang sku gzugs la sogs pa la bskor ba dang mchod pa dang phyag byas nas/ slob dpon la yang dag pa'i yon dbul ba rnams 
78a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis yongs su mnyes par bya'o// 'dir gtso bo snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor du po ta rab gnas bya'o// gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad la gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'o// mi bskyod pa'i gtso bo'am/ rdo rje 
78a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' 'am gtso bo la ni sku gzugs thams cad dang rigs mi shes pa rnams kyang rab tu gnas par bya'o// yang na sku gzugs kyi lha gang gi rigs gang yin shes pa na rigs de'i de bzhin gshegs pa gartsi
